summary: A Zant preset for Race menu
descriptionHtml:
along with my Linkle preset i was playing my LOZ play through this idea came to me. why not have Zant as an enemy that i could battle. so i wasted another 2 hours of my life just searching for something that had to do with Zant whether it be a preset or follower or enemy. Again i came up with nothing and decided to take matters into my own hands. sadly i do not have the knowledge to make the body have the patterns or have the face tattoo. so we are stuck with this until i decide I'm tired of it and learn how to make one or one of you make one. it wasn't meant to look exactly like him because as i was searching for zant on the internet i found a zant helmet. so after another 3 hours i ended with this. if you wish to make it a follower or enemy be my guest but please for din's sake credit me because i spent 3 hours of my life slaving away at this.if you wish to create the body and upload it as like a new race please credit me. he is a [u][i][b]high elf[/b][/i][/u]

Requirements
Eyes of Aber - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?[/url]

Recomended
Zelda: Zant's Helmet - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=79152894]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=79152894[/url]
Zelda Twilight Princess: Twilight Sword - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=78803946]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=78803946[/url]
WSCO - Windsong Skyrim Character Overhaul (Occidental version) - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52322/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52322/?[/url]
Tribunal Robes and Masks - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20077/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20077/?[/url]
author: littlelee99
